QuestData.Title: Relief for the Fallen
QuestData.Description: The refuge's defenders fight bravely, but they cannot keep up with the iron onslaught.$B$BWith the earth you collected, I can make bandages to help heal the wounds of some of the fallen. The more defenders we can patch up, the longer we'll last out there.$B$BTake these poultices and use them to heal the wounds of the fallen defenders outside the refuge. Get as many back into the battle as possible, $n. Every casualty is one too many.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Telluric Poultice to heal 8 Fallen Earthen Defenders, then return to Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you healed the fallen defenders?
QuestData.RewardText: The warriors that you've healed will aid us in holding the line even longer. If we are to truly be free of the iron threat, we must find a way to strike at them behind the lines.
